name: Vera Health
headline: AI-powered clinical decision support for healthcare providers
description: We empower healthcare providers, starting with emergency physicians, with instant access to up-to-date evidence-based answers. Our platform cuts through the noise to deliver trustworthy medical information 10x faster, revolutionizing clinical decision-support.

founders.name: Taieb Bennani, Founder
founders.description: Background in Biomedical Engineering from Yale and Data Science from MIT. Beyond obvious passion for AI and healthcare, I’m an avid reader (I highly recommend The Unbearable Lightness of Being by Kundera!), and tennis & football enthusiast.

founders.name: Maxime Allouch, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Vera Health. Previously at MIT, Sorbonne, and HEC – dual background in business and AI. Passionate about health and fitness, I also compete in Spartan Races.

# Accelerating evidence-based medicine
AI-powered clinical guidance at the point of care
# Accelerating evidence-based medicine
## AI-powered clinical guidance at the point of care
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4ieLkWaFg1UC9wtNc6i285It9Q.png)
Backed by Y Combinator
[Try Vera](https://www.vera-health.ai/<https:/app.vera-health.ai>)
[Try Vera](https://www.vera-health.ai/<https:/app.vera-health.ai>)
## Trusted by 
## Trusted by
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/i1LmBczlrZQQv52a7UX7sUrAk6c.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/XX2ndytamodySDSprvJ38Rjvnds.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NfcHnrqg4w0FaFRAXF7tIznnCfg.jpg?scale-down-to=512)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NfcHnrqg4w0FaFRAXF7tIznnCfg.jpg?scale-down-to=512)
## Our Mission
## Our Mission
At Vera Health, we believe in a future where **every healthcare provider has immediate access to the most current, evidence-based knowledge** —right when they need it most. Our mission is to empower clinicians and to be a trusted resource that supports them every step of the way. By streamlining the delivery of clinical knowledge, we aim to give providers more time to focus on what matters most—**delivering exceptional care to their patients**.
Vera, short for Veracity, is powered by a continuously updated corpus comprising millions of peer-reviewed studies, consensus-based clinical guidelines, and primary research literature. Our expertise in AI research has enabled us to build the **highest-performing clinical decision support** (CDS) tool on the market, achieving a 92% score on the US Medical Exam. But we know that a strong exam score is only part of the equation. By collaborating with clinicians, we’ve enhanced the model’s **reliability and safety** in real-world clinical settings, ensuring it’s **tailored to meet the specific needs of healthcare providers**. Our model is trained and evaluated using a proprietary benchmark based on consensus guidelines and appropriate clinical applications, designed to support providers in delivering the best care possible.

But we know that a strong exam score is only part of the equation. By collaborating with clinicians, we’ve enhanced the model’s **reliability and safety** in real-world clinical settings, ensuring it’s **tailored to meet the specific needs of healthcare providers**. Our model is trained and evaluated using a proprietary benchmark based on consensus guidelines and appropriate clinical applications, designed to support providers in delivering the best care possible.

How does it work?
Our system is built on a sophisticated AI architecture where proprietary models work in parallel to deliver evidence-based answers. Think of it as a team of healthcare professionals accessing over 200 million scientific papers, collaborating asynchronously to gather information. Every response is derived strictly from medical evidence, ensuring the most accurate and up-to-date information is provided to support clinical decisions.
Is it ChatGPT?
How reliable is Vera Health?
Is it up-to-date?

generated_description:
Vera Health is a promising startup revolutionizing clinical decision support with an AI-driven platform aimed at empowering healthcare providers—starting with emergency physicians. Founded in 2024, Vera Health is based in San Francisco and is part of the Y Combinator Batch S24, a notable launchpad for young companies.

Their mission is clear: to provide healthcare professionals with immediate access to current clinical knowledge and evidence-based information in real-time. In a field where the stakes are high, having swift access to trustworthy medical information can transform patient care. Vera claims their solution delivers answers ten times faster than traditional methods, allowing clinicians to spend less time searching for guidance and more time focusing on patients.

At the heart of Vera’s innovation is "Veracity," an AI system powered by a continuously updated database of millions of peer-reviewed studies and clinical guidelines. This not only allows the tool to deliver reliable information but has also earned it an impressive 92% score on the US Medical Exam. Yet, Vera Health knows that technology alone isn't enough. By collaborating directly with clinicians, they ensure their product evolves in alignment with real-world clinical needs.

Vera Health's small yet mighty team currently consists of just two co-founders, Taieb Bennani and Maxime Allouch, both of whom bring complementary expertise to the venture. Their focus on generative AI in the healthcare space places them at the intersection of technology and medicine—an area ripe for innovation.

If you're intrigued by the potential of AI to enhance clinical decision-making and improve patient outcomes, check out their site [Vera Health](https://www.vera-health.ai). It’s exciting to watch how this company is poised to change the landscape of healthcare support.
